revision.comment: ===Etymology 3=== From {{m|en|you}}. ====Pronoun==== {{en-pron}} # {{pronunciation spelling of|en|you}} #* '''2006''', Carmen Portnoy, ''The Money Pie: A Recipe for Women Investors'' (page 6) #*: "Hey, Sis, do '''yah''' want a Hertz Donut?" one of them sweetly said as the other one held out a donut bag. She reached for it. Her step-sister snatched the bag away and socked her hard in the arm instead.
